code: import React,{createContext,useState}from"react";import{getImagesFromSearchTerm}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const PhotoContext=/*#__PURE__*/createContext();const PhotoContextProvider=props=>{const[images,setImages]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const runSearch=async query=>{try{const response=await getImagesFromSearchTerm(query);const images=response.map(image=>({id:image.id,fullImageUrl:image.urls.full,smallImageUrl:image.urls.small,title:image.description}));setImages(images);setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.log("Encountered an error with fetching and parsing data",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PhotoContext.Provider,{value:{images,loading,runSearch},children:props.children});};export default PhotoContextProvider;
